Topic.Title: Help wanted: Creating a delay before displaying additional text

Posts.EditableText:
How would I go about creating a delay before text in a passage shows up?

For example, a passage displays "You wander around aimlessly for a few minutes.", waits 10 seconds, and then adds "Suddenly you hear the phone ring."
Posts.HTML:
How would I go about creating a delay before text in a passage shows up?

For example, a passage displays "You wander around aimlessly for a few minutes.", waits 10 seconds, and then adds "Suddenly you hear the phone ring."
